actionItems.item: Practice reframing conversations — present plans instead of seeking direction
actionItems.notes: Don't show up with 'empty shelves'. Present observations + proposed solutions. Ask 'How does this align?' not 'Tell me what to do.'

actionItems.notes: Cory's recommendation: 6+ months to see results. Goal is turning down 'monkey mind', not stopping thoughts. Cory sending meditation resources.
